QuestData.Title: Great Minds Drink Alike
QuestData.Description: Hello again, $n. What is this, the fourth time we've run into one another already?$b$bSay... my keg is quickly becoming quite empty. I've heard mention of a brewery to the southwest, and that's where we're headed. Care to join us?
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Chen Stormstout and Li Li to the brewery in the southwest.
QuestData.RewardText: If yer lookin' fer beer, you came to the right place, neighbor.$b$bJust, ah... excuse the mess. Had me a bit of a problem with virmen the last few days.
